text: Alpha Nine Zulu, this is Control Node. You are ordered to switch your primary data link to frequency shift keying modulation at 1200 baud on a 14 kHz carrier. In the event that no acknowledgment is received within five minutes, automatically revert to continuous wave transmission at ten words per minute. After completion of the mode change, calculate and apply a new CRC-16 checksum to the node table and broadcast the updated checksum to all adjacent peers. Effective immediately, upon receipt of this command, execute and log any errors to local memory in the return status report. Confirm execution of all directives by return status message. Out.

structured_data.summary: switch primary data link to FSK 1200 baud on 14 kHz
structured_data.additionalNotes: Execute primary modulation change as ordered by control node

structured_data.summary: fallback to CW transmission at 10 WPM after 5 minutes no ack
structured_data.additionalNotes: Trigger CW fallback upon no acknowledgment within timeout

structured_data.summary: calculate and apply CRC-16 checksum to node table
structured_data.additionalNotes: Compute CRC-16 as specified after mode change

structured_data.summary: broadcast updated checksum to all adjacent peers
structured_data.additionalNotes: Distribute new checksum to neighbors per directive

structured_data.summary: execute and log any errors to local memory
structured_data.additionalNotes: Store error records in onboard memory for status report

structured_data.summary: confirm execution of directives by return status message
structured_data.additionalNotes: Send acknowledgment of completed commands back to control

structured_data.summary: detect acknowledgment messages from control node
structured_data.additionalNotes: origin: implied – needed to trigger fallback logic

structured_data.summary: initiate 5-minute countdown timer after mode change
structured_data.additionalNotes: origin: implied – required for no-ack detection

structured_data.summary: store execution logs in local memory
structured_data.additionalNotes: origin: implied – needed for status reporting
